taskDescription: What is the stereochemistry of the pyruvate reduction shown in Figure 19.13? Does NADH lose its pro-R or pro-S hydrogen? Does addition occur to the Si face or Re face of pyruvate? (Review Section 5.11.)
detailedSolution: Addition of the pro-R hydrogen of NADH takes place on the Re face of pyruvate.
